extension.name: CiviCRM UK GiftAid
extension.description: CiviCRM support for Gift Aid. The extension comprises a couple of custom data sets to hold all Gift Aid data, a profile to use on contribution forms to collect this data, a task to batch 'gift-aidable' contributions and a report to submit batches to HMRC.
extension.comments: For support, please contact project team at support@compucorp.co.uk or get in touch on github https://github.com/Compucorp/uk.co.compucorp.civicrm.giftaid/issues
